utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You sure this is where she said she was going?

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah. 9th and Jay.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: Tory said she still can’t get a trace on Beckett’s phone. Says it’s either been turned off or disabled.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There. There’s her car.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: "Help her". They want us to know they have her.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Damn it.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right, let’s get CSU down here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: 1045! I want every available unit canvassing. Everyone questioned.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: … security and traffic cams in the area. ATMS, businesses, anything with eyes on the streets. Go, go, go!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s him. Boudreau, Tyson, whatever he’s calling himself, it’s him and it’s Nieman.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: But they were in the precinct with us.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Giving them the perfect alibi. Meanwhile they use Amy Barrett as bait to draw Beckett out.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You think Barrett was involved in this?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Or she’s a victim, too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We need to find Nieman and we need find Boudreau.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Mr. Boudreau! Open the door!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Mr. Boudreau, shortly after leaving to meet with your friend Amy Barrett, one of our detectives went missing.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I don’t know. I’ve been in police custody until an hour ago.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Giving you the perfect alibi.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I don’t have an alibi because I didn’t do anything wrong.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then why won’t you let us in?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett? Beckett!

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Come on, man. Nobody’s here. It’s just me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What’d you do to her, huh, Tyson? Where are you keeping her?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I’m not keeping her anywhere and I’m not Jerry Tyson.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: No, no. Come on, man. You can’t do this! You can’t just come in here and threaten me!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I know it’s you! I know it’s you!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You’re not helping her. Not like that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what, we just let him kill her?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: No! But Castle, we can’t do anything if we don’t have anything.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s him, Kevin. It’s Tyson.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We need to prove it. We’ll put units on him. Put him under the microscope. If it’s him he won’t be able to make a move without us knowing it. We’ll find her.

utterance.speaker: KELLY NIEMAN
utterance.content: Okay. Look all you want, Detective Esposito. She’s not here and I have no idea where she is.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What about your client, Amy Barrett?

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: My office gave you our information on Amy Barrett. I can’t help it if her contact information is out of date.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, bet you can’t. Just like you have nothing to do with Detective Beckett’s disappearance.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: You seem to think that I’m something that I’m not. And how could I be involved? I was with you at the time.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’ve got a unit on Boudreau’s place and a car standing by.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN VICTORIA GATES
utterance.content: Espo, put a unit on Nieman as well.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hear that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Anything on the canvass?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: We’ve pulled officers from the third and eighth precincts to help. If there’s a witness out there we’ll find them.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about video?

utterance.speaker: TORY ELLIS
utterance.content: The immediate area where you found her car didn’t have any street camera or security coverage.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Making it the perfect place for an abduction.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: I have teams from four precincts pulling all video from a ten block radius from where Beckett was taken. It’s a longshot, but –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about Amy Barrett? The phone call she made to Beckett. Can we trace that?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: We did. To a cell phone. It’s no longer active.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We’ve got Amy’s picture out to every cop and every transit worker in the city.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Amy’s not going to be in public. Not if she’s working with Tyson.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And we’re assuming Boudreau is Tyson, but what if Mike Boudreau is really Mike Boudreau? What if Nieman actually cut him to look like Tyson, just to give us someone to chase? What if the real Jerry Tyson is still out there?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. He’s just messing with our heads. Boudreau is Tyson.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: It’s doesn’t make any sense. Why would he let himself get arrested? Why would he risk returning to his apartment?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s part of the thrill. To be here, among us, within our grasp? He wants to see how close he can get to the flame. That’s what excites him. It’s not just the murder he likes. It’s the game. We had him and we let our guard down. That was his plan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, can you hear me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please, Castle, I need your help!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where are you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh God, Castle! Please! You have to help me. Castle! Help me!

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: What was the number?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: How long to trace?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Don’t know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It sounded like she was struggling. She was trying to get away from someone. She could still be there.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: It’s a pay phone operated by Centi-Com.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Tracing it now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Come on, come on.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Got it. Upper West Side parking lot. By the west side highway.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Fan out. Secure the area.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: There’s something here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Careful. It might be rigged. Okay.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s a voice recorder.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, can you hear me? Please Castle, I need your help. Oh God, Castle! Please! You have to help me. Castle! Help me!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She was never here.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: He’s playing us.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He’s probably watching us right now. I need a chopper! I need search teams on every roof. Let’s go!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I don’t understand. If this is a recording, when did they get her to say this?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: They didn’t. The recording was manufactured. Digitally spliced from what appeared to be several different sources.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What sources?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: This, for one. It’s an interview Beckett gave to the local news just after you disappeared.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please, if you have any information or know anything about the disappearance of Richard Castle, I need your help.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: And here’s the recording.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, can you hear me? Please, I need your help.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Given the background noise on some of these other words, I’m guessing parts of this were recorded in public using a parabolic mic on the street. Maybe even at crime scenes.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Then this was planned. They’ve been preparing this for months.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: It looks that way.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: This was about Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. That interview? That was meant as a message to me. He wants me to suffer.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Why? Why is Tyson fixated on you? If he’s directing this at you he may try to communicate. We should put a trap and a trace on all your phones.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: I’ll set it up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Captain, he’s already communicating. He’s out there sitting in Boudreau’s apartment and he knows where she is.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And we can’t touch him until we have proof.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: By then she’ll be dead! Please, Captain, this is – she's my wife.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Mr. Castle, I know you’re hurting. We all are. But we have to keep our wits about us. We have to work the evidence. It’s the only way we can get her back.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Captain. Canvass at the abduction site found a witness who said that she saw someone matching Beckett’s description. Said she was in a wheelchair being pushed towards a red van. And uh, witness also said she appeared unconscious.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She must have been drugged.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Did they see who was with her?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No, and the person pushing the wheelchair was wearing a hoodie.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about a license plate?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: But that’s a start. Get teams scrubbing all street cam footage from blocks nearby. Find that van. We are going to get her back.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: No. No, no, no. I told you that I’m not –

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Oh, God!

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Guys. This is from a traffic camera two blocks away from where Beckett was taken.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That’s a red van.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Heading away from the abduction area.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You run the plate?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Belongs to a plumber in Queens. He reported it stolen three days ago.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That’s gotta be it.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right. I’ll run an APB.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Make sure we let Castle know, too.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, where is Castle?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: You’re out of –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is she alive?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Help! I need help! Get off me! Get off me!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I told you, I don’t know!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Huh? Why’d you do it, Tyson? For revenge? Because we were happy?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: You have got the wrong guy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The hell I don’t. Where is she?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You planned this. You and Nieman. But it ends tonight.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Go to hell.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Hey. Hey. Hey, man. No, no, no. Wait a minute.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Tell me where she is, Tyson, or so help me God.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I don’t know. And I’m not Tyson. He just wants you to think I am.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I didn’t do this. I didn’t do any of this.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: I’m not him! I – Doctor Nieman just made me look like him. But I’m not him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: My name is Michael Boudreau. I swear. I was – I was born in Iowa. I was raised on 11725 North Genoa Street. My parent’s names are Michael and Lauren. I’m not Jerry Tyson! I’m not. I swear.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t believe you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Now. Last chance.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: No, no. Please. Don’t. Please.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Come on, Castle. Assault with a deadly weapon? Do you have any idea what this does to the investigation? You don’t think I wanted to go over there and beat the hell out of him? And Nieman? That’s not going to get her back.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: He’s pressing charges. We’re going to have to book you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Me? What about him?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We don’t have anything to hold him on.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You are never going to win going straight at him. If he thought there was any chance of that, then he wouldn’t have stayed in that apartment.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: We’ll take care of the rest of the booking details later.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Anything on the van?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: No. Not yet.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You know, when I first got here I couldn’t figure out what Beckett saw in you. But you know what she said? "He sees the story. I see the evidence, where it leads, but he sees the story." That man got inside your head and you let him. You want to help her? You’ve gotta get inside his. What’s his story? What’s his next move going to be? Now, you figure that out and we’ll find her.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Sir?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It’s Boudreau. Tyson. On the way back to his apartment, he bolted on the subway platform. Jumped down on the tracks. Our guys tried to follow him, but they lost him.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I want transit authority on full alert. Put every unit in the area on the lookout and get his picture on the wire. I want him found!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Captain, I just sent teams to Kelly Nieman’s apartment to check on her. She’s gone.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: How can she be gone? We’ve been on her place the whole time.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: They found an access door to the roof open. She must have went out of it and climbed across the roof to another building.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Get an APB out on her. Get teams down to the hospital, see if she’s seeing any of her patients.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: How did it feel to be that close?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Tyson.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Trace. Go.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: You know what part I liked best? The pain in your eyes. The suffering. And all that fear, knowing that I have her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, if this is about me, take me. Take me and let her go.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: No. No, if I took you I’d only get to kill you once. You see, this way I get to kill you over and over again.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Tyson. Tyson?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Ryan. Did you get him?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Stand by. Wait … wait. We got it. The number’s coming through right now!

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Where’s he calling from?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Oh God. Castle? He’s calling from your house.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where’s Alexis?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad, what the hell?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You have your passport?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Yes. Yes, yes, yes. But Richard, Europe? I’m –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No buts. I need to know that you’re safe. Now, the police are going to take you to the airport, and I have friends waiting for you on the other side.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad, please be safe.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I will. But I need you to go.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Okay. Take care, baby. Be careful.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We just heard from tech. No evidence of anyone tampering with your phone. They think that Tyson must have figured out a way to spoof your number from the outside.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Inside, outside, it doesn’t matter. He wants me to know he can get to me any time.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’m sorry. I had him. The night at the motel. If I could have found a way to move a little faster, react a little sooner.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s not your fault. It’s not my fault. It’s his fault.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo. A uniform in Queens spotted that red van off the APB.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Parked outside of an abandoned industrial property.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is she there?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We don’t know. But an ESU team is on its way.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: How many others?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: All right, stay behind us. If he’s in there he’s going to be gunning for you first.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, wait! Get back! It’s a trap!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett! No!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: God.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, I’m so sorry. I’m so –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m so – I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s not her! It’s not her!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who was the girl?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Former drug addict, just like the others. She was reported missing last week. Found a speaker underneath the chair. That’s how he was able to broadcast Beckett’s voice.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And the weapon?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Pre-aimed at the victim, triggered remotely.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He wanted us to watch. He wanted us to watch.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You think she’s still alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s alive.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: How do you know?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because he’s not done with me yet.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Good. You’re awake. We can get started.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Our new victim’s name is Sydney Novick from Browick Country, Florida. We believe she may have been targeted by Tyson and Nieman due to facial similarities between her and Detective Beckett. Given the nature of these murders …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We’re not going to find her. Not like this. Not by chasing him, not by playing his game. We need to take the game to him.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: I know you. You’re the writer. You and your cop friend put me in here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: For murders that your cellmate, Jerry Tyson, convinced you to commit, so the world would think you were 3XK and he could get away scot free.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: Why are you here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You shared a cell with him for four years.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: Time I’d rather forget.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: You look at him, you think, he’s so weak. There’s nothing to him. But the guy, he knew how to get into your head. He knew how to get you to do things you never thought capable of.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Like killing for him?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: Let’s just say I slept a lot better once I knew he was dead.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He’s not. It’s just another way for him to disappear so he could make his plans.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: He’s alive?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And he has my wife. You shared a cell with him for four years. No one knows him better than you. In all that time did he ever mention a place somewhere in the city, a place he would go to feel safe?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: You need my help.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, I need your help.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: You put me in here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He put you in here. He got you to do those things. He got inside your head. Controlled you like a puppet. You’d done your time but he needed you to get caught. You sacrificed yourself that night, and not a day goes by you don’t see his face and wonder how did he do that? How did he get me to throw my life away?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: There was some place he talked about. A place he liked to go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: What’s in it for me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What do you want?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: Out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know I don’t have the authority –

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: I’m sure with all your connections you can find someone who does.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: They’ll never go for it. Not going to release a murderer. They’ll let her die first.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: That’s not my problem.

utterance.speaker: CASTE
utterance.content: Please. Something else. Money. For your family. Give me something I can give you.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: I don’t have a family, Mr. Castle. And I am stuck in here for life without the possibility of parole, so what the hell do you think you can give me that will be worth a damn?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Revenge. He’s out there, walking around, and you’re in here. Don’t you want to settle the score?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Fine. I just didn’t think after all these years you’d still let him control you.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: What kind of revenge?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: There was a place he talked about. A place in the woods.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: A little ways up the Hudson, owned by a family friend. When he was a kid he’d go there in the summers when things got too intense with his mother.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hello, are your archives digitized? I was wondering if you could email me a set of the building plans for the following address.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS GATES
utterance.content: You know, you can’t save her. When he sees the cops coming – and trust me, he will see the cops coming – he won’t bargain. He won’t be reasoned with. He will just kill her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It won’t be the cops.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’ll be me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Amy Barrett.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You think Barrett is involved in this?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Or she’s a victim, too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So she was working with him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Don’t scream. Or I will shoot you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where’s Beckett? Is she inside the house?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: Not here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: I don’t know. They wouldn’t tell me. Not until it’s over. They sent me here to wait.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t believe you. Who’s down there? Who’s in the house?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: Just me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re lying. They’re in there, aren’t they?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: No. If you bring me back there I’ll show you.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Making sure you stay out of my way. You know what I love about this car? All the trunk space. Get in.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: If I’m lying and they are down there? They’re going to miss me soon. They’ll know you’re out here. They’ll kill you both.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Despite the situation, I want you to know I admire you. I always have.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: There’s no point in resisting, Detective. In fact, if you accept that I can remove the gag.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Good. And please don’t scream. It’s tedious. And no one can hear you.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Much better.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: It’s a crime to cover up such a lovely face.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Kidnapping and murder are crimes. You can still save yourself.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: I’ve already been saved.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: I used to be ashamed of who I was inside. The things I dreamt about doing. And then I met Jerry and it was like … coming home. So if you think that I would ever turn on him, you don’t understand me at all.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do you think he’s going to do when you’re no longer useful to him? He will kill you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I am your only chance, Kelly. I can help you.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: And you’re going to.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: With all the police attention I’ll need a new face.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: And I’ve chosen yours.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. No. No, please. Please!

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: All right. This is going back on.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please, no!

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Shh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s not here.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: But you are.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: So glad you could join me.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Faces fascinate me. The mask we show to the world? I find that clients invariably hope a procedure just won’t just change their looks, but change who they are in some deeper way. It never does. No more than painting a house can change the things that happen inside of it.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Yes. Do you have him?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ve got him. Did you get what you need from her?

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Enough. I can do the rest after.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Well, get her ready. Wait for my call.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: It’ll all be over soon. But I’ve so enjoyed our time together.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Take a seat.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Please. You have me now. Just let her go.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, no. I can’t. She’s part of the plan. Why I brought you here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Brought me?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: You know what I love about human beings? Is they’re so predictable. They’re like mice. You can get them to do anything. All you have to do is put a little cheese at the end of the maze, know exactly when to shock them.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You knew I was coming.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Dangling Boudreau in front of you? Watching Beckett die before your eyes? Once I had the cops chasing their tails I knew it would be only a matter of time before you did something on your own. Visiting my old cellie was a – well, it was a natural choice.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This was a setup.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: What better way to get you here alone than to make you think it was your idea?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why? Why are you doing this to me?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Because I want to see your face. I lured you here so I could see your face while you watched her die.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. That’s not it.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This isn’t about me, is it? It’s about so much more than that. This is about you. Your inadequacy. All the games, all the manipulation? After I screwed up your plans, you needed to prove you were smarter than me. You needed to know you could control me.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Well, you’re here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know, I’ve written characters like you. Cunning psychopaths so narcissistic they believe they can’t be caught. Because they’re smarter than everyone and they need to prove it. Now that’s your story, Jerry. Why you did everything. You needed to prove it. So I let you.

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I let you bring me here. It was the only way to find you. I needed to find you so I could find her. But the truth, Jerry?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We’re not going to find her. Not like this. Not by chasing him, not by playing his game. We need to take the game to him.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Put this deep in your ear. All right? All the way in.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The truth is, I lured you here. To watch you die. Are we clear?

utterance.speaker: TYSON
utterance.content: Clear about what?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then take the shot.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Ryan, he’s down.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You have her location?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, here. This is the last number he called. Beckett’s with Nieman.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I need an emergency trace on the following number.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: Something’s wrong. He should have called by now.

utterance.speaker: NIEMAN
utterance.content: I’m afraid it’s time, Detective.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: There!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I was so scared!

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: That was the stupidest, most reckless, irresponsible stunt you’ve ever pulled, Mr. Castle.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Okay. All right, all right. All right. Okay.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: There’s still the matter of the assault charges.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Assault charges?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah… it’s a – it’s a long story. But Captain … you can’t be serious.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Serial killer or no, you threatened an unarmed man with a gun. The DA takes that very seriously. But … in light of your outstanding work on this case, he’s willing to drop the charges if you agree to a thousand hours of community service.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A thousand hours?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Yes. As a consultant to Detective Beckett and the 12th Precinct.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m – I’m … I’m being unbanned?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Mr. Castle, welcome back.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Spoke with my mother and Alexis. They said they’re on their way home, just as soon as they do some shopping.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t know how you did it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kept it together the two months I was missing. Two days I didn’t know where you were and it nearly killed me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You ever think about what happened? When you were gone?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All the time.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Every time I close my eyes I see her face.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I see his, too. Since that night on the bridge. You know how I deal with it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I open my eyes and look at you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks for coming to get me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Always.
